module.title: GStreamer
module.description: GStreamer is the core library. It contains the headers, core library files, and core elements.

module.title: GStreamer Base Plug-ins
module.blurb: an essential exemplary set of elements
module.description: GStreamer Base Plug-ins is a well-groomed and well-maintained collection of GStreamer plug-ins and elements, spanning the range of possible types of elements one would want to write for GStreamer. It also contains helper libraries and base classes useful for writing elements. A wide range of video and audio decoders, encoders, and filters are included.

module.title: GStreamer Good Plug-ins
module.blurb: a set of good-quality plug-ins under our preferred license, LGPL
module.description: GStreamer Good Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that we consider to have good quality code, correct functionality, our preferred license (LGPL for the plug-in code, LGPL or LGPL-compatible for the supporting library).

module.title: GStreamer Ugly Plug-ins
module.blurb: a set of good-quality plug-ins that might pose distribution problems
module.description: GStreamer Ugly Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that have good quality and correct functionality, but distributing them might pose problems. The license on either the plug-ins or the supporting libraries might not be how we'd like. The code might be widely known to present patent problems.

module.title: GStreamer Bad Plug-ins
module.blurb: a set of plug-ins that need more quality, testing or documentation
module.description: GStreamer Bad Plug-ins is a set of plug-ins that aren't up to par compared to the rest. They might be close to being good quality, but they're missing something - be it a good code review, some documentation, a set of tests, a real live maintainer, or some actual wide use.

module.title: GStreamer Libav plug-in
module.blurb: Libav-based plug-in containing many decoders and encoders
module.description: GStreamer Libav plug-in contains one plugin with a set of elements using the Libav library code. It contains many popular decoders and encoders.

module.title: GStreamer Python Bindings Supplement
module.description: GStreamer python overrides for the gobject-introspection-based pygst bindings.

module.title: GStreamer RTSP Server
module.description: RTSP server library based on GStreamer

module.title: GStreamer VA-API integration
module.description: VA-API-based decoder, encoder, postprocessing and video sink elements for GStreamer.
module.maintainer: Sreerenj Balachandran, Víctor M. Jáquez L., GStreamer Team

module.blurb: Cerbero build system for Windows, OS/X, Android and iOS
module.title: Cerbero cross-platform build system
module.description: Build system to build GStreamer and all dependencies from source and create binary packages for Windows, Android, OS/X and iOS

module.title: Library of Optimized Inner Loops Runtime Compiler
module.description: Library and set of tools for compiling and executing SIMD assembly language-like programs that operate on arrays of data.

module.title: Qt bindings
module.description: QtGStreamer is a set of libraries providing C++ bindings for GStreamer with a Qt-style API, plus some helper classes and elements for integrating GStreamer better in Qt applications. The goal of this module is to allow easy use of GStreamer for applications targetting MeeGo Mobile or the KDE desktop. More information can be found on the QtGStreamer wiki page

module.title: GNonLin plug-in
module.description: GNonLin contains a set of plug-ins for GStreamer to ease the creation of multimedia editors, or any other application where a timeline-oriented use of GStreamer makes sense.

module.title: GStreamer OpenMax plugins
module.description: OpenMax-based decoder and encoder elements for GStreamer. Replacement for gst-openmax.
module.status: obsolete (no longer used or useful, use Video4Linux2-based decoders and encoders instead)
